Dragon's Grasp

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, monk
Benefit: When you use the grab action, you gain a feat bonus to the attack roll equal to your ki focus’s enhancement bonus. In addition, when an enemy provokes an opportunity attack from you and you are wielding no weapons, you can make a grab attack in place of a melee basic attack.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 139.
